item.title: 美国拖延向南非提供 26 亿美元气候融资一揽子计划
item.description: 熟悉情况的人士说，美国正在拖延向南非分配 26 亿美元的气候融资，这激起了人们对这笔资金可能被彻底冻结的担忧。【原文：The US is stalling the distribution of $2.6 billion in climate finance to South Africa, stoking concerns the money might be blocked outright, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 英国央行利率决议前英国工资增长强劲
item.description: 英国的工资增长保持在九个月来的最高水平，就业率也有所上升，这表明对工人的需求具有弹性，可能会使英国央行对进一步降息保持谨慎。【原文：UK wage growth held at its highest level in nine months and employment rose, evidence of resilient demand for workers that will likely keep the Bank of England cautious over further rate cuts.】

item.title: 交易员豪赌英国央行降息次数超市场预期
item.description: 一年多来，期权交易商对英国央行下调利率的赌注最大的一次，其幅度超过了市场预期，而决策者们正在准备可能是几个月来最鹰派的货币政策决定。【原文：Options traders have placed one of the biggest bets in over a year on the Bank of England lowering interest rates by more than markets expect, just as policymakers prepare what might be the most hawkish monetary policy decision in months.】

item.title: 德国工业游说团呼吁提高天然气储存的灵活性
item.description: 德国工业游说团体要求在天然气储存设施加气方面留出更多余地，认为这将有助于缓解该行业与高额能源费用的斗争。【原文：Germany’s industry lobby pushed for more leeway in refilling gas storage facilities, arguing it would help ease the sector’s struggle with high energy bills.】

item.title: 土耳其动荡推升里拉借贷成本至多年来最高点
item.description: 土耳其当局周三以腐败罪名拘留了雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安总统的主要政治对手后，离岸市场上土耳其里拉的借贷成本升至两年来的最高点。【原文：The cost of borrowing Turkish liras in the offshore market rose to the highest in two years after Turkish authorities detained President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s main political rival on corruption charges on Wednesday.】

item.title: 泰国顶级购物中心建造商计划耗资 36 亿美元进行五年扩建
item.description: 随着城市化进程的加快和旅游业的蓬勃发展，泰国最大的购物中心开发商 Central Pattana Pcl 计划在未来五年内投资超过 1,200 亿泰铢（约合 36 亿美元），用于建设新的零售广场、办公楼和其他物业。【原文：Central Pattana Pcl, Thailand’s largest shopping mall developer, plans to invest more than 120 billion baht ($3.6 billion) in the next five years to build new retail plazas, office buildings and other properties amid rising urbanization and booming tourism.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑在就业数据和英国央行决议公布前从 1.30 美元下滑
沙特阿拉伯将勘探租约授予一些主要矿商
item.description: 包括印度韦丹塔有限公司（Vedanta Ltd.）和中国紫金矿业集团（Zijin Mining Group）在内的大型矿业公司已获得在沙特阿拉伯勘探金属的租约，这也是沙特阿拉伯王国推动金属业发展的举措之一。【原文：Major mining companies including India’s Vedanta Ltd. and China’s Zijin Mining Group have been awarded leases to explore for metals in Saudi Arabia, part of the kingdom’s push to expand the industry.】

item.title: 泰国将放宽长达 53 年的午后售酒禁令
item.description: 泰国将放宽对酒类销售和广告的限制，加紧推动饮料市场的自由化，这可能会刺激旅游业并支持小型酿酒厂。【原文：Thailand is set to ease restrictions on alcohol sales and advertising, stepping up a push to liberalize a drinks market seen as likely to spur tourism and support smaller breweries.】

item.title: 马来西亚启动新一轮搜寻失踪的 MH370 航班计划
item.description: 在马航 370 号航班失踪十年后，马来西亚政府为新的搜寻工作开了绿灯。【原文：Malaysia’s government has given the green light for a new search for Malaysia Airlines flight 370 a decade after the aircraft disappeared.】

item.title: 人工智能先驱认为少数模式能在中美大洗牌中幸存下来
item.description: 中国企业家李开复预计，在 DeepSeek 的出现引发的国内大洗牌中，只有三种人工智能模型能够幸存下来。【原文：Chinese entrepreneur Kai-Fu Lee expects just three AI models to survive a domestic shakeup triggered by the advent of DeepSeek, which up-ended the existing template for artificial intelligence development.】

item.title: 特朗普称印度将于 4 月 2 日受到互惠关税打击
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，印度将从 4 月 2 日起被征收同类产品关税，尽管新德里的官员们正努力通过减少贸易壁垒来安抚华盛顿。【原文：US President Donald Trump said India will be hit by like-for-like duties from April 2, even as officials in New Delhi scurry to appease Washington by reducing trade barriers.】

item.title: 据说阿达尼和 Emaar 正在讨论 14 亿美元印度业务的交易结构
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）正在进行收购迪拜开发商 Emaar 集团印度分公司的高级谈判，潜在企业价值为 14 亿美元，这将有助于这位亚洲第二富豪拓展房地产业务。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani is in advanced talks to buy the Indian unit of Dubai-based developer Emaar Group at a potential enterprise value of $1.4 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, helping Asia’s second-richest person expand in real estate.】

item.title: 地产巨头海因斯聘用施罗德高管负责欧洲富豪业务
item.description: 美国房地产巨头 Hines 聘请了 Schroders Plc 的前高管 Eugenio Cicconetti，在全球资金管理公司纷纷专注于私人财富领域的大背景下，为欧洲的富豪建立自己的部门。【原文：US real estate giant Hines hired former Schroders Plc executive Eugenio Cicconetti to build out its unit for Europe’s rich amid a global boom in money managers focusing on the private wealth sector.】

item.title: 中国加快电网投资以吸收大量太阳能发电
item.description: 中国加大了对电力网络的投入，使其能够从世界领先的太阳能发电厂吸收更多电力。【原文：China has boosted spending on its power networks to allow them to absorb more electricity from its world-leading buildout of solar plants.】

item.title: 前软银创雨者纳赫塔被选为 Bakkt 扭亏为盈的负责人
item.description: 阿克谢-纳赫塔（Akshay Naheta）是软银集团的前官员，曾负责监督该集团的一些最大交易，他已加入 Bakkt 控股公司，担任联席首席执行官，帮助这家陷入困境的美国加密货币交易和托管平台扭亏为盈。【原文：Akshay Naheta, a former SoftBank Group official who has overseen some of its biggest deals, has joined Bakkt Holdings Inc. as a co-chief executive officer to help turn around the struggling American crypto trading and custody platform.】

item.title: 贝莱德基金被没收的中国大厦将以亏损 40% 的价格出售
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：A China office complex previously owned by a BlackRock Inc. fund is close to being sold at a discount of more than 40% in a deal that would lead to losses for the US asset manager and banks backing it, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 在 "尘埃落定 "之前，南非将改变汇率走势：日间指南
item.description: 南非储备银行在评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策将对通胀产生的影响时，将淡化上月物价涨幅低于预期的情况，并维持借贷成本不变。【原文：The South African Reserve Bank is set to look past a smaller-than-expected rise in prices last month and keep borrowing costs unchanged while it assesses the impact that US President Donald Trump’s trade policies will have on inflation.】

item.title: 散户需求升温，香港计划设定新股保证金贷款上限
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港市场监管机构正计划对首次公开发行股票时用于购买股票的保证金贷款设置上限，以抑制散户投资者的炽热需求。【原文：Hong Kong’s market regulator is planning to cap margin loans used to buy shares at initial public offerings, according to people familiar with the matter, in an effort to clamp down on heated demand from retail investors.】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老金对特朗普治下的美国能源资产保持警惕
item.description: 由于可再生能源和化石燃料项目政策的不确定性，澳大利亚一些最大的养老基金正在对美国能源资产投资采取谨慎态度。【原文：Some of Australia’s largest pension funds are taking a cautious approach to investments in US energy assets due to policy uncertainty for renewable and fossil fuel projects.】

item.title: 中国人民银行加强现金支持，中国债券从跌势中回升
item.description: 在中国央行加强短期资金支持后，中国政府债券延续了复苏势头。【原文：Chinese government bonds extended a recovery after the country’s central bank boosted short-term funding support.】

item.title: Couche-Tard、Seven & i 在 3 月底前征求美国商店的意向
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Seven & i Holdings Co.和 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.旗下美国便利店剥离方案的潜在买家必须在本月底之前表达他们的兴趣，并表明他们能够克服反垄断方面的担忧，因为有关可能的联合的谈判仍在继续。【原文：Potential buyers for a divestiture package of Seven & i Holdings Co. and Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.’s US convenience stores have until the end of the month to express their interest and show they can overcome antitrust concerns as talks over a possible union continue, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 菲律宾中央银行行长称菲律宾将抵制比索大幅波动
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，菲律宾央行将抵制比索的大幅波动，尤其是在比索走软的情况下，因为本周从印尼到土耳其的新兴市场都变得动荡不安。【原文：The Philippine central bank will resist big swings in the peso, particularly if it is weakening, Governor Eli Remolona said, as emerging markets from Indonesia to Turkey turned volatile this week.】

item.title: 韩国结婚人数激增，为老龄化国家带来希望
item.description: 韩国的结婚率是有记录以来最高的，这对于一个在经济悲观情绪日益严重的情况下一直在加大力度提高世界最低生育率的国家来说是一个充满希望的迹象。【原文：South Korean marriages increased the most on record in a hopeful sign for a nation that has been ramping up efforts to boost the world’s lowest fertility rate behind growing economic pessimism.】

item.title: 特朗普称美联储应降息，关税推动升温
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，美联储应该降息，在官员们权衡他推动关税政策的经济成本之际，他与美国央行产生了分歧。【原文：President Donald Trump said the Federal Reserve should cut interest rates, splitting with the US central bank as officials weigh the economic cost of his tariff push.】

item.title: 中国股市对香港股市的溢价有望创 2020 年新低
item.description: 随着对人工智能的乐观情绪推动投资者转向香港市场，中国大陆股票与在香港上市的同类股票之间的价格差距有望达到四年多来的最低点。【原文：The price gap between mainland China stocks and their counterparts listed in Hong Kong is poised to reach a more than four-year low, as optimism in artificial intelligence drives investors to the city’s market.】
